mapper.insert: insert into salary (money, year, month, employee_id, payout_id) values (#{money}, #{year}, #{month}, #{employee.id}, #{payout.id})
mapper.update: update salary set money = #{money}, year = #{year}, month = #{month}, employee_id = #{employee.id}, payout_id = #{payout.id} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, money, year, month, employee_id, payout_id from salary
